name: Call of Duty: The War Collection
description: Call of Duty: The War Collection is a bundle pack of the games Call of Duty 2, Call of Duty 3, and Call of Duty: World at War. The bundle pack is only available for the Xbox 360.

name: The Cost Of Seeds
description: The price seeds is way too high! You are sick of it so you marching over to the seed factory and getting you fill

name: Cirnozardry

name: Requie-mu

name: Dream "ID" Journey

name: YuMayhem

name: Mamono Hunter Youko: Makai Kara no Tenkousei
description: Makai kara no Tenkōsei is based on the anime series Devil Hunter Yohko. The anime focuses on Yohko Mano, a Japanese high school student who discovers that she is the 108th Devil Hunter, destined to fight supernatural evil beings in accordance with her legacy. The game puts the player in the role of Shoma, a new exchange student who meets Yohko and her best friend Chikako at his new school. Miraculously, the three are teleported into a parallel dimension, and the reluctant hero discovers, to his amazement, that its inhabitants seem to be familiar with him. The game plays like a typical Japanese-style adventure, with a menu of verb commands (Look, Talk, Think, and Move) at nearly every screen, some leading to object lists. It is often necessary to go through the commands several times to unlock a new one or trigger events. Limited menu-based navigation is also present.

name: Mamono Hunter Youko: Tooki Yobigoe
description:
Tooki Yobigoe is a direct sequel to Mamono Hunter Yōko: Makai kara no Tenkōsei, continuing where the story of the previous game left off. Yohko, Shoma and Setsuna are attacked by demons on the flying ship, and have to use their recently found powers to fend them off. As opposed to the previous game, where Shoma was the protagonist, Yohko is the player character in the sequel.

Gameplay-wise, the puzzle-less Japanese adventure format is further utilized. Verb commands must be selected from a menu and sometimes combined with objects or character names for interaction. It is often necessary to repeat commands several times to trigger the next event.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - House of Ashes
description: House of Ashes is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

description: The most powerful monster in history, Badu, is on the verge of resurrection. Become the descendant of the god, Latok and restore peace to the Kingdom of Wavis!

description: DEATHSPRINT 66 redefines hardcore arcade racing, fusing high-speed on-foot racing with a dystopian setting and deadly obstacles. Unleash your velocity, push limits, and claim glory like never before.

description: LEAD the CULT OF CTHULHU. Decide the fate of your followers, perform eldritch rituals, and master the art of city-building in a world where the line between sanity and madness blurs. Can you endure the horrors you unleash?

name: Tails of Iron II: Whiskers of Winter
description: Embark upon a vast, snow-ravaged kingdom in Tails of Iron 2, sequel to the critically acclaimed action-RPG. As Arlo, heir to the Warden of the Wastes, adventure through harsh northern lands, home to giant beasts and ragtag bandits, in an epic quest to overcome an ancient, blood-starved evil.

name: Industria II
description: INDUSTRIA 2 is a narrative FPS adventure about a woman stranded in a parallel dimension. Explore, scavenge and fight your way through a mysterious boreal landscape consumed by an ever-hungry artificial intelligence to find a way home.

name: Knights in Tight Spaces
description: Control your environment, gather your party, and build your best deck to overcome outlaws and supernatural forces, across a rich fantasy world. Watch as your tactical choices and deckbuilding prowess play out through stylish fight sequences.

name: In Tent to Kill!
description: Detective Johnson must solve the murder of a juggler by interviewing suspects and solving the puzzle.

name: Rooftops
description: Rooftops is a Call of Duty 4 fan-made campaign which involves new and exciting scripted sequences, fun gunfights and cool new cutscenes to support the story. It takes place in a fictional universe independent from the original game's story, revolving around S.A.S. Task Force 99, which becomes involved in an undercover Russian operation in Italy.

name: Rooftops 2
description: Rooftops 2 is a Call of Duty 4 fan-made campaign that brings lots of visual improvements in the core game, a lot of assets and features are borrowed from the original Modern Warfare 2 and 3. It is a direct sequel of Rooftops, taking place immediately after it ends.

name: The Deal
description: The Deal is a total conversion single player mission mod for Call of Duty 4 which is heavily inspired from the 007 James Bond movies along with other video games and movies. The mission revolves around a secret meeting that takes place in middle of London on which the MI6 is spying upon.

name: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops
description: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops is a Call of Duty 4 custom single player mod heavily inspired by the spec-ops mode from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. The mod provides a good collection of short spec-ops levels full of fun objectives and cool mission concepts. The levels are based on custom levels found in the mod Rooftops.

name: Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier
description:
A port of Jak and Daxter: The Lost Frontier, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters. The game was originally released in 2009 as the sixth and final game in the Jak and Daxter series. The player assumes the role of Jak, the angst-ridden hero enhanced by his exposure to Light and Dark Eco.

When their world begins to run out of Eco, Jak and Keira travel to the edge of the world in search of the ancient Precursor machinery that could reverse the planet's decline. They're not the only interested factions out on the Brink, however; Jak must contend with Sky Pirates while struggling to control his own Eco powers.

name: Gods Eater Burst
description:
GODS EATER BURST is an updated version of the first title in the series, GOD EATER, featuring many improvements, new characters, and scenarios which provide even more intense high-speed battles for players to enjoy!

*This product is based on the PlayStationPortable title, GODS EATER BURST, released in 2010.
*There may be some differences from the PSP version, but these will not affect the game's progression.
*Multiplayer and exchange of avatar cards with other users are not supported in this version.
*The update distributed previously will not be released or applied to this version.

name: Last Case of Benedict Fox: Definitive Edition
description:
Take on the last case of Benedict Fox and dive into a twisted world of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded murders. Explore the memories of deceased victims as you search for clues and fight demons in this fantastical Lovecraftian Metroidvania.

The Definitive Edition brings new animations and upgraded AI, topped by new stories to discover filled with brand-new puzzles.

name: R Drive
description:
Pedal to the metal, and turn the wheel to the right and... to the right!?

Looks like your car has a few technical issues, and the wheel can't turn left! Keep on moving, avoid obstacles and collect coins to speed up! Each coin will throw another obstacle so be careful... but hey, at least the brakes work!

You'll score by picking up coins and moving at high speeds! The faster, the more each coin's worth, but don't be afraid to hit the brakes if things get too hectic. However, if your speed reduces to 0 or you hit a wall or obstacle, you'll lose!

Recover the space station, shuttle, and moon base from the forces of " BLACK DAWN ", an international terrorist group that threatens the universe. The stage is cleared when all the bombs in the stage are recovered and the final location is reached. After defeating the stage's boss, there is a bonus quiz, and if you answer correctly, you will receive bonus points.

Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

description: In this game, you will become a keeper of knowledge, collecting shards of divine crystals. Look for the right way to crystals. Avoid dangerous obstacles. Teleport from one space to another to get closer to your goal.

These choices determine the final emotional outcome. In the end, who will Huang Di's true love be

name: TheDay

name: Unreal Trail: In the name of the Strongest, 30 Hunters Forced to Evolve
description: Unreal Trail: In the name of the Strongest, 30 Hunters Forced to Evolve is a turn-based light meat pigeon game set in the land of aerial fantasy. Choose your current round of battle hunters, battle after the victory to strengthen, until the end of the level, unlock new characters!

name: Chaotic Conflicts
description: Chaotic Conflicts is a casual and chaotic fast-paced Online FPS game. In this chaotic shooter you'll try to shoot your way to the top of the scoreboard while competing with other players and random events.

name: Grandma Don't Click That!
description: Play as a computer virus destroying grandma's PC. In this unique platformer meets liquid physics simulation you will find yourself flowing through electronics, corrupting files, and evolving with only two goals in mind... spread and destroy!

name: Obsolete Souls Episode 0: Operation Haiti
description: Fight against King Khard and his will in this action packed "beat em' up" prequel to the Obsolete Souls RPG!

name: Illumination
description: In the dense forest, there are endless mysteries.

name: Shock Wave
description: On the Silent Night of All Saints, monsters come to the human world at night.

name: Indies 2: Burning Kindling
description: A turn-based strategy game that combines deck-building and tactical chess. Players control an expedition team consisting of three heroes, embarking on an adventure to find their way home. By scavenging equipment and building decks, players gradually forge their own path of battle。

name: Break Through
description: Breakthrough is an action game in which you fight giant enemy robots. Equip weapons that fall on six floating bits and destroy the enemy's parts. Enemies can be won by destroying their cores, which are located somewhere on their body. Manipulate the six bits to eliminate all enemies.

name: Hexpire
description: Hexpire is a relaxing city builder where you build a prosperous empire by careful building placement.

name: BallBastic!
description: An arcade-style passion project based off similar ball-rolling games from the early 2000s. Guide the ball to the goal within the time limit, and be sure not to fall off!

name: Shrimp Game
description: Become a pilot of a SHRIMP - Submersible Hydrodynamic Research Integrated Marine Platform. Krill your friends, explore areas for loot and customize your SHRIMP!

name: Sword vs. Horde
description: A melee based horde survival game. You are a knight wielding an oversized greatsword. Whirl it around in circles and use your blade's momentum to slash through endless hordes of monsters. But take care! You'll get dizzy from all the spinning!

name: Road Engineer
description: You are a Road Engineer. Build roads and bridges to optimize traffic, cost, speed or distance for different vehicles on a lot of various and challenging levels!

name: Anomaly Echoes
description: You're stuck in a loop with your biggest fears. You need to face and overcome your fears to get out of this place.

name: Blockits
description: You appeared in this world, in an empty hub connecting four distinct areas. You don't know who or what you are, and there's just a lot of different levels that can become really interesting and challenging to go through.

name: Balium
description: Welcome! We are now going into open beta, free to play. This is a 5 year long project by 1 developer. Local play can be done with up to 4 controllers, or 3 and keyboard/mouse. Internet play has been added, and offers different modes of play like battle royal, timed, etc..

name: Door Simulator
description: In case you have ever wondered how to open a door. This game will guide you through the basics of door opening, all the way to its secrets the government doesn't want you to know about.

name: BlokhedJelli
description: BlokhedJelli is a 2D platforming collect-a-thon that takes you on an adventure to different worlds; each with its unique theme and strange inhabitants.

name: Olga: Episode 1
description: Relive Olga's childhood memories as she visits her grandparents' home in Belovodica, a secluded mountain village where some discoveries last a lifetime.

name: Rental Commander
description: A sci-fi action RTS style game where you drive and pilot the vehicles. Go head to head in a 5 v 5 battle of the ages. Rent and command your squad, but don't expect them to follow orders, they're going renegade the moment you're not in control.

name: Emergency Cleanup Co.
description: A simulation game about an employee at a cleaning company.

name: Haunted Arcade
description: A cozy Arcade Game Collection turned on its head by the twists of a local Ghost.

name: Kart Them All
description: Face your friends in this frenetic party-game! Dodge attacks with your kart and send your enemies flying off the track with bonus items thanks to its excessive physics.

name: Junkybots
description: Junkybots is a build-your-combo action roguelike with fighting game mechanics. Prepare yourself to dive into dimensional portals and face countless wave of monsters as you build and upgrade your moves and skills.

name: Crops!
description: Crops! is an autobattler in which your fruits and vegetables come alive! Plant your crops in specific patterns and place them strategically to defend against rats, kobolds and even dragons.

name: Mushroots
description: New RTS for everyone!

name: Sis and Bro The Cyborg Siblings
description: A visual novel RPG where you play as one of two adorable robots and do whatever you want, even if you wanna do nothing!

name: Eko And The Bewitched Lands
description: "Eko and the Bewitched Lands" is a roguelite action RPG game. Help Eko on his mission to save the bewitched lands filled with enemies. Acquire and upgrade weapons of all kinds to combat and discover all the secrets that awaits for you.

name: Crop Chronicles
description: Dive into Crop Chronicles, where farm gaming evolves! Race against time, manage diverse crops, and fulfill dynamic orders. Embrace strategy and teamwork across 47 thrilling levels. Farm, fish, and flourish in this captivating adventure!

name: Rogue Sky
description: Master gravity-defying flight mechanics and time-bending powers in this bullet hell rogue-lite where strategic depth meets intense gameplay. Unravel synergistic upgrades and enhancements as you stop the alien invasion from ever happening. Are you ready to dominate the skies?

name: Batteri Fjell 1945
description: Rumors are circulating about unrest at Fjell Fortress outside Bergen, and it's your job as a journalist to get to the bottom of what's happening. Explore an accurate reconstruction of the fortress as it appeared when World War II ended in 1945.

name: DudeGo
description: Each map is different and has a challenge for you. Are you ready to conquer the unexpected? Prove that you can handle every challenge the game has to offer. Last survivor is the winner. will it be you?

name: Project Cottontails
description: "Project Cottontails" is an interactive narrative adventure in the Manduria Civic Museum. Step into the shoes of Alessio, explore the museum, interact with characters and objects to piece together the story of your ancestor, a famous Allied aviator in World War II.

name: Primage
description: As the leader of a Stone Age tribe, gather resources, develop your settlement and lead your people through the challenges of a world full of danger and mystery. Your survival skills, strategic planning and decision-making will be key in this battle for survival.

name: Pollie
description: In a world devastated by an apocalyptic disaster, where once-thriving cities are left in ruins, a lonely robot named Pollie finds itself in a relentless adventure.

name: Etheral
description: Etheral is a solo ARPG project that aims to be inclusive for those with limited time, while delivering an engaging narrative. Combat is mechanic focused and is Inspired by modern God of War and Hades, while sobering narrative tone is inspired by the Witcher and Song of Fire and Ice.

name: Planetka
description: You play as a tiny sentient planet. Maintain your ecosystem, create new plant species and discover the hidden powers inside you. You’ll need them soon, because there is a human spaceship approaching with the intention to mine all your resources and they don’t care if it kills you in the process.

name: Hallowed Haven
description: In 'Hallowed Haven,' a pixel art dark fantasy platformer, guide an imp hero and their child through the eerie netherworld. Uncover secrets, meet diverse characters, and find the elusive Hallowed Haven. Will you escape the darkness?

name: Hororo Meguru's Bing!! Ball
description: "Hororo Meguru’s BING!! BALL" offers a whimsical take on pinball action. Score big solo, or enjoy chaotic fun in 4-player matches. Collect enchanting Hororo stills as you progress. Easy to pick up for an on-the-go arcade delight!

name: Mushrush
description: Embark on a whimsical journey as a humanoid mushroom in this platformer adventure. Traverse through floating islands, giant trees, caves and lakes to befriend a group of fungal friends that can all grow together.

name: Galaxy At War
description: Enter the cockpit of your spaceship and prevent the destruction of our homeland! You and your friends have to dodge various attacks and fight many enemies. But your Twitch chat can support you in your defense and your subscribers can even accompany you as wingmen!

name: Personal Finance Simulator
description: Choose how much money you start with, a profession, and a city, then make personal financial decisions! Will you end up rich or end up getting evicted?

name: Light Path
description: This is a casual racing game. You drove a big truck to a coastal city and had a car race in the city.

name: Crystalline Bliss
description: Embark on a journey to serenity within the eternal realms of pure consciousness in Crystalline Bliss. This lo-fi, melancholic, psychedelic voxel puzzle game transports you to the otherworldly landscapes beyond our reality. Delve into the mysteries of your soul and find your path to joy.

name: Once Upon a Fight
description: The story of your journey has begun to be written. Choose from a variety of different characters, each with unique abilities, in this chaotic multiplayer party game set in magical and fantastical lands. Whether alone or with allies, carve your name in history for eternity in Once Upon a Fight!

name: KunKunHome
description: This is a fictional story in which you play as a KunKun enthusiast named Su Shan, who sneaks into the suspected KunKun residence to explore.All content in the game is unrelated to reality, and any similarity is purely coincidental.

name: Penalty
description: Penalty is a 2D Openworld adventure RPG, with unique gameplay mechanics, FBF animations, and beautiful sound and visual effects. Fight your way through with zour weapons and with zour magic, you can use to customize your hero with armor and weapons.

name: Pawn Simulator
description: Pawn Simulator, Prove your trading prowess. Find the most profitable products by bargaining and show off your trading skills. Develop your trading strategies and master your tactics to stay ahead of your competitors. You're no longer just a vendor, you're on your way to becoming the ruler of Detroit's trading world! Make a name for yourself with your achievements in every trade and prove that you are the most successful merchant running a pawn shop.

name: Trucking Simulator
description: Experience the thrill and challenges of life on the open road in Trucking Simulator! Strap in, hit the gas, and embark on an immersive journey through the bustling highways and scenic landscapes. Navigate your massive rig through ever-changing road conditions to deliver your cargo safely and on time

name: Burger Time
description:
A mobile port of the arcade game BurgerTime for Japanese phones.

"Burger Time", which was very popular in arcade games and consumer games, has been revived as a mobile app game!

The purpose of the game is to complete a delicious hamburger by dropping the necessary ingredients down while dodging the annoying ingredients that are chasing you.

By combining various ingredients, let's make various kinds of hamburgers and complete the menu list!

name: Piggy's Great Adventure
description: Let's have a great adventure with Piggy the Little Dragon! Gather a group of unique friends and fight against dark demons! Fantasy SRPG is here!

name: Fountain
description: Lead a squad of up to 7 members entering a constantly changing barrier. In this mysterious adventure, meet interesting companions, fight against various enemies, collect rare treasures, and reveal the secrets concealed within the barrier.

name: Detective: The Motel
description: Detective The Motel is a deduction game where, to advance, you must take a pencil and a piece of paper and write down everything that seems like evidence in order to answer all the questions that arise. Solving the case will depend only on you.

name: Inseedious
description: Free multiplayer roguelite game in Slavic mythological world. Innovative landlords vs players mechanics.

name: How Old is James?
description: How Old is James? is a game about humanity. Assemble memories through a variety of brain-tickling puzzles and discover a hidden life of the main character, to ultimately answer — what makes us human.

name: Core Breach
description: Core Breach is a fast-paced, top-down arcade shooter where you out manuever and destroy anti-virus enemies as a trojan worm. Upgrade your trojan worm with attacks and skills to breach the core.

name: Project Down
description: "Project Down" is a 4-player co-op survival game. Uncover mysteries behind Hex Corporation by exploring the map and be cautious, as your mission area has become highly dangerous post-experiments.

name: Starlight Riddles
description: Starlight City is a city where the boundaries of reality are blurred. Waking up in an unfamiliar city with no memories of the past, you will find that you are not the only one suffering from amnesia. Residents of the city have also lost touch with their past, shrouding the place in mysteries.

name: Goeland
description: Take off as a mischievous seagull, and soar into a captivating escapade! From playful pranks to selfless deeds, be the ultimate feathered troublemaker or a helpful hero. Solve puzzles, unravel secrets, and engage with an interactive world. Let your wings decide the fate of this charming adventure!

name: LingTian1
description: LingTian1 is a 3D visual style otome game. The Prince is madly in love with you. 500+ shots of exquisite dynamic images, 200+ scenes , main line and 9 side lines, Sections for interacting with the prince. Fully Voiced.

name: The Last Hospital
description: Every decision made influences humanity's fate, with USMLE level medical questions woven into patient care, revealing the mysteries of a dying world.

name: Luffi: Homebound
description: Luffi is returning home from time away at Hartfer's Art Academy. Explore, collect memories and make new friends along the way! Relax and enjoy a wholesome cozy experience as you journey home.

name: Day Of The Tank
description: Day of The Tank is a retro top down shooter where you have to defend your Command Post from waves of enemy tanks by killing them all. Fight across multiple destructible levels. Experience old school tank gaming from the 1980s, but with a modern save system!

name: Astral Rift
description: Fight and Explore your way through randomly generated dungeons full of hordes of dangerous enemies and powerful bosses to restore the Astral Crystal and save the world from spatial collapse! Expand your arsenal and brew potent potions as you grow into the strongest adventurer of all!

name: Cut the Cards
description: Create your own cards in this roguelike deckbuilder by cutting and pasting throughout your deck! Journey to the chasms, fighting off dragons and Boviks alike as you manage scarce resources.

name: Inexorable
description: Inexorable is a single-player first-person sci-fi shooter narrative set in the year 2133. Navigate and fight your way to the digital heart of the Dark Megalopolis with your AI protégé at your side. Uncover the truth behind the rise of AIs and decide the fate of machines and humans alike.

name: Pocket Pusher
description: Your coin-pushing and ball-dropping fix! Drop strategically, win rewards, and enjoy the classic arcade thrill from the comfort of your home. A premium coin pusher experience, minimized.

name: Flyga
description: Be free as a bird, by being a bird. Fly around a vast landscape to explore it's nature and meet its inhabitants, both animal and human.

name: Atlas of the Starry Night
description: Fly on a broom, fight enemies, unlock new powers, and explore a planet full of secrets and challenges. A twist on the metroidvania genre. Choose your own path and abilities on your quest to collect the fallen stars and return them to the sky.

name: Gaze of Dread
description: Mary Thorne has booked a week-long getaway at a rental house to escape the distractions of her family so that she can focus on her project. While staying at the house, Valley View Escape, she begins to notice an unnerving presence watching her every move.

name: Endless Return
description: Exciting arcade action game where you will fight against hordes of enemies, upgrade your skills, and choose from a variety of weapons and abilities. With each battle you become stronger and unlock new possibilities. Dive into thrilling battles in captivating world of "Endless Return".

name: Our Doomed Bunker
description: Our Doomed Bunker is a short 1-4 player co-op puzzle horror game

name: Riftstrider
description: Riftstrider is a deckbuilding roguelite with a twist - your deck is a 2D grid of orbs. Link elemental orbs to unleash powerful combos while battling foes through ever-shifting rifts in spacetime. Each run is a new adventure.

name: The Maze of Zabendo
description: You play as Theo Abescar, a detective who is determined to find out what happened to his favorite park and cartoon when he was a child.

name: Factory Tower
description: Immerse yourself in the unique experience of rebuilding the towers of the complex with the robot courier and his AI. Solve puzzles, explore mysterious towers and restore Terra's factories to working order. Embark on an exciting journey where every step brings new challenges and mysteries!

name: Geometry Survivor
description: Geometry Survivor is a survival rogue-lite game, where you fight with waves of shapes and trying to find a way from madness.It might be difficult, but also [DATA LOSS]

name: Project Bob
description: After a High_tech artificial intelligence robot named "SH" goes wild, you realize that you can't defeat him alone so you start to make a robot, helping you to stop him.

name: Hadley's Run: A Starship Saga
description: Slay your way through a relentless enemy horde in this roguelike twin-stick shooter. Kick ass. Find love. Save the universe.

name: Rime's Quest
description: Rime's Quest is an exciting adventure in the world of the Roman Empire, where an ordinary traveler decides to leave his everyday life and go on a dangerous journey. During the game, the player will go on an epic quest full of interesting events, riddles and encounters with numerous enemies.

name: Night of the Assassins
description: Night of the Assassins - you will find yourself in the role of a mysterious killer, able to manipulate the shadow and hide in it in order to approach your enemies unnoticed. Your character is a master of stealth and the art of assassination, who is legendary.

name: Black Wolfberry: WuJing
description: This is a third-person action shooter where you need to break through a maze

name: Insider Threat
description: Insider Threat is a first-person survival horror game that focuses on creating fear and tension for the player.

name: Pumpkin Woods
description: Collect magical ingredients and build your cozy witch home while exploring the wonderful sights and secrets of these mysterious lands. Beware though, danger might be lurking deep in these woods...

name: The Alchemist's Apprentice in the Maze of Madness
description: A loveletter to the dungeon crawler genre, filled with procedurally generated mazes, mix and match puzzles, traps and upgrades.

name: Patrol Simulator: To Protect and to Serve
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey with "Patrol Simulator: To Protect and to Serve". Experience exhilarating police chases, transforming pursuits into adrenaline-fueled races. Dive into diverse career paths, infiltrate gangs, and collaborate with the SWAT team for an unparalleled gaming experience!

name: Little Oceania
description: Little Oceania is a minimal strategy building game. Create a delightful medieval kingdom in the middle of the ocean by placing cute miniature structures. Plan your space well, earn money, discover new buildings and biomes, and continually expand your picturesque island kingdom.

name: Sterospeed
description: Difficult Game To Master

name: Interwoven
description: Interwoven is a fantasy hack-and-slash centered around the peak of the Hundred Years' War. Join Alrion and Gylfie on a continental journey to escape an elite, rogue task force that seeks to capture them, dead or alive.

name: Aisla
description: You play as Aisla, a woman who wakes up with no memories in a complex on Mars. Your objective is to explore the environments and discover who the character is and what situation she is in.

name: Crackernuts
description: Crackernuts is a narrative game about a goat-headed girl and her sister, a no-bodied head. They are on quest to find themselves and rescue their village from a curse of darkness.

name: Bunker Invaders
description: Work with your crew to keep the bunker standing.

name: Hunting With Dad
description: Dad needs you to hunt slimes. Do it, he will give you magic powers.

name: Animals vs. Animals
description: Let the race begin!

name: Kickback
description: Kickback is a top-down shooter with roguelike elements, where shooting is the only way to move. Repel waves of mutants, create combinations of weapons and upgrades to optimally navigate the enclosed arena and avoid collisions with enemies.

name: Slot Advanture
description: Are you lucky or bad? 2D turn-based action adventure game. Defeat the monster with the hit rate you get by turning the slot. You can also get the character's stat, various items, and good ability buffs all at random. Trust your luck and go on an adventure rather than a high-level strategy.

name: Baisu
description: Step into the shoes of Detective Clay Kriest in "Baisu," a chilling tale of family, art, and the haunting unknown. As you arrive at the secluded residence of Maple Street 22, responding to an eerie call for help, you'll find yourself immersed in a quest shrouded in darkness.

name: Permanent Mark
description: This is a zombie style tower defense game that is easy to learn and suitable for all ages.

name: Sunken Shadows
description: A retro FPS roguelike set under the sea. Your soul inhabits an ancient machine. Find the people responsible for your agony. Make them pay. Featuring intense melee combat and fast grappling movement inside of an ever changing dungeon spanning multiple biomes.

name: Luma Island
description: Travel to Luma Island to go on an epic adventure by yourself or with your friends and family. Build your dream farm, master professions, collect magical Lumas, find treasures and unravel the mysteries of the island.

name: Freelife
description: Co-create a universe teeming with potential in this open world voxel sandbox.Craft a character that reflects your style, race around the city in high-octane vehicles, manage your underground empire or team up with friends for daring operations and thrilling heists!

name: Meme Christmas
description: An incredible New Year's roguelike in the genre of Survival! Immerse yourself in the holiday atmosphere and hold out as long as possible from the hordes of Memes and defeat all the Bosses...

name: Crawler
description: You awaken in an endless cycle of dungeon terror. Armed with basic magic weapons and measly change of coins, you'll amass wealth and unlock limitless enhancements for your arsenal. Do you have what it takes to become a top Crawler slayer?

name: Space Pirateer
description: Steer your ship, explore the vast expanse of space, trade for resources, pillage ships and colonies for precious loot. Carry out tasks for various faction governments vying for domination. Would you be a freelancing privateer, or pledge allegiance to a faction and carry out their sinister agenda?

name: Lamina Bruise
description: Lamina Bruise is an interactive short story narrated through imaginative technology. Hack a new path, traverse a world divided by inhospitable climate, escape the burning home.

name: Soulscape: Shadows of The Past - Episode 1
description: Soulscape: Shadows of the Past is an immersive and atmospheric adventure game that will take you on a journey into the world of Blake Turner, a former agent grappling with the shadows of his own past. Join us on the adventure through episode 1.

name: Pieces of the Past
description: 'Pieces of the Past'— a cute, sentimental adventure where you fix and restore family keepsakes, uncovering touching stories. Blend puzzle-solving with the joy of preserving memories in this delightful journey!

name: Primordial Genesis
description: What a strange dream. I stood in a bloody field in front of a heart that pulsated while floating in the air. I asked him for immortality, and in return, I received infinite versions of myself that died faster and faster every day. I am still living that painful eternal dream.

name: Crystal Conquest
description: Crystal Conquest is the world's first 3v3 VR MOBA. Choose a class. Become a powerful mage. Topple enemy towers with your teammates. And defeat the crystal guardian to keep the only remaining source of magic out of the hands of evil.

name: Test Subject Name
description: [Test Subject Name] is an FPS Platformer that sees you descend through layers of test chambers, fighting multitudes of robots along the way, using weapons taken from enemies, and coming in contact with intelligent machines that want you dead.

name: Deck of Delirium
description: Deck of Delirium is a PvE deckbuilding card game where you build your own misfit crew full of animals, pirates, animal pirates, pompous sailors, and even cultists to make your way through the perilous journey across the sea battling rogue pirates, sea monsters, and other uncanny enemies.

name: PC Tycoon 2
description: Manage your computer company and develop your PC components, create your own laptop, monitor, develop an interactive operating system or build your PC. Research new technologies, improve your office and your factory, hire the best employees, buy other companies and build your computer empire!

name: Froggy Bouncing Adventures
description: Jump into a bouncing adventure to save Froggy’s best friend! 60 levels of leapfrogging platforming and hat collection!

name: Amazing Weekend: Search and Relax - Collector's Edition
description: Amazing Weekend: Search and Relax offers a variety of unique and compelling mini-games and hidden-object puzzles! Complete games to unlock new levels and explore interesting new locations where you'll go hiking, horseback riding, boating, and relaxing through a weekend of recreation!

name: Pirate Pop Quest
description: "Pirate Pop Quest" sets sail on a thrilling arcade adventure that tests you with reflexes! Burst bubbles of vibrant colors as you navigate through challenging levels. Strategically match pairs to unleash cascading combos and unlock treasures hidden beneath the waves!

name: Fool's Paradise
description: Invited by a stranger to join Fool's Paradise, you'll seek a sense of community without conformity as you make choices that determine to the fate of the commune and all those within it. So, when confronted by division and derision, will you change the status quo or are you content to let it crumble?

name: Cooldown
description: [Cooldown] is a rhythm-based defense game. Destroy the endless robot debris flying through space, strengthen your turret, and protect your planet! Develop various technologies and robots to defeat enemies more effectively! Get more rewards while listening to your own recorded music!

name: Simploe Tasks
description: 3D horizontal board shooting fixed viewing angle.

name: Starfall Odyssey
description: Explore planets, battle space pirates, uncover the universe's secrets in Starfall Odyssey's epic cosmic journey.

name: Illegal Football
description: This is a surrealistic football game. You will form a national football team composed of super heroes, use some unusual ways (such as match-fixing, bribing the refree), and lead them to challenge the top teams in the world to win the world championship.

name: PegIdle
description: PegIdle is a peggle idle game! Destroy thousands of pegs by dropping thousands of balls. Purchase auto drop which will drop balls for you! Score points by hitting pegs, clearing the board and being dropped into the pit!

name: Quest of Dungeloria
description: Quest of Dungeloria is a cosy metroidvania set in a dying fairytale kingdom with a non-linear plot. Hardcore action, platforming puzzles and lots of secret areas. Shape the ending with your choices!

name: Somber Echoes
description: Take the role of the resurrected Adrestia and embark on an epic journey to prevent your twin sister from unraveling the universe. Master acrobatic combat, explore the Greco-Roman space vessel Atromitos, and shape your destiny in Somber Echoes.

name: Gloomgeons
description: Gloomgeons is a retro style 3D first person perspective game that combines the nostalgia of legend FPS games with the dungeons exploration. Step into a mysterious world of skeletons, wizards and golems.

name: Tarot Realms
description: Select three cards from a shuffled deck to get a spread for Past, Present, and Future. See how the chosen cards correspond to the Tree of Life sefirot. Provide your feedback as we work on interactive Tarot characters and locations together. Join us in making a meditative immersive Tarot experience.

name: Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Challenge
description: 'Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Challenge' is a puzzle game where you fill in 100 jigsaw pieces. Can you clear this monumental challenge? The time for the showdown has arrived.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Anime 5
description: Puzzles of Anime!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - South Korea
description: Puzzles of South Korea!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Dogs 2
description: Puzzles of dogs!

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Bonsai
description: Try 24 detailed pictures with busy backgrounds, ideal for puzzling, full of Japanese spirit. Visit Tea Ceremony with Racoon Tanuki and view a lot beautiful Bonsai themed puzzles

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Paper Art
description: Step into a world of digital enchantment with our 3D Paper Art DLC - a captivating collection that fuses traditional craftsmanship with modern design, contains 37 creations! Download now and infuse your puzzling with the magic of 3D paper art - where creativity knows no bounds.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Bears
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Fairground
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: South Korea
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Agricultural Machinery
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Variety Pack 23
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate Jigsaw: Civil Unrest
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: A Maze Dream: The Puzzle Journey
description: Can you beat the Maze? Solve puzzles, use your special powers and manage resources in this challenge!

name: Glitch Maze.exe
description: In this fast-paced arcade game, inspired by Pac-Man, you navigate through a dark maze, chasing the highest score. Avoid the lurking dangers, find secrets and game-changing power-ups as you explore the maze. And remember, even your failures can illuminate your path through the darkness.

name: Maize Mace Maze
description: Dig, grow and harvest plants in your ever-expanding underground maze. Command squads of veggies, plant defensive fruits and upgrade your perishables to better protect against the next onslaught of vicious pests!

name: Tank Maze
description: In terms of visuals, sound effects, and user experience,

name: A Blocc World
description: A voxel-style open-world RPG. Use a variety of melee, ranged and magical combat abilities to smash your way to saving the world. Grow your strength, with powerful abilities and equipment. Learn about the world of Blocc from friendly characters, and try to keep them in one piece.

name: Acorn Hunt
description: A cute, time-based, acorn-moving puzzle game filled with charm. Take control of Skylar Squirrel and get your acorn home fastest.

name: Agent Brain: Tricky Puzzles
description: Every level introduces a unique solution method, breaking the fourth wall between the game and the player in unprecedented ways. From using a pause button to halt threats to turning off the sound to put an enemy NPC to sleep, the game continually surprises and engages players.

name: Age of Water: The First Voyage
description: Embark on your first adventure on a post-apocalyptic Earth completely covered in water. Sail through storms, fight and trade, capture other people's boats or build your own, extract resources from the bottom of the ocean, reveal the secrets of the Age of Water world.

name: All City King
description: All City King is a stealth game where you take the role of an up-and-coming street artist. Your target is the subway trains and your goal is to make your art travel all over the city.

name: A Living Room
description: You are a man in a room. Something feels off. Or maybe it's on. A short existential comedy point-and-click non-adventure about the limitations and imitations of human existence – or, really, whatever you want it to be about.

name: Alien Bob
description: Alien Bob is a fun but challenging, retro, precision platformer, spread across fast paced open areas and more intricate, precision based, enclosed areas, with a variety of environmental dangers and enemies along the way.

name: Alchemy Unbound
description: A drag and drop crafting game that offers unbound possibilities. No limits, no direction, just pure creativity and endless crafting.

name: Alonecats
description: Colorful mischief-makers have settled in this valley. Solve puzzles to find them all in a new unique game in the genre of animal search.

name: Alphageddon
description: Throw asteroids on them, raise their sea levels and even make the whole moon fall on their heads! This is only a fraction of what you'll have to do to make sure your perfect creation is safe in this game mixing fast reflexes, strategy and lots of fire and destruction.

name: Amo
description: Amo is a top-down metroidvania, where a lost dog, Amo, gets stranded on an island. Explore the vast environments, fight through the enemies of the past, and solve the many mysteries that the island holds.

name: Angel Spirit
description: Embark on a mystical journey as an angelic spirit. Navigate through ten unique atmospheric levels on a quest to unlock magical powers.

name: Animal Falling
description: Animal falling is a multiplayer party game featuring cartoon animals in ball form, engaging players in a platform race filled with strategic obstacles and traps to hinder opponents. Unleash your mischief, obstruct rivals, and navigate the chaotic hilarity to victory in this wild, furry showdown!

name: An Island Away
description: Set off on a relaxed adventure to explore Dewdrop Island! Climb, glide, and backflip your way around paradise to find the reclusive Island Elder.. but what's the big rush, when there's so many fun locals to meet along the way and fishies to catch?

name: Anomaly Loop
description: You woke up and found yourself in an anomalous endless place from which it is not so easy to get out. Carefully observe your surroundings to find a way out of this place.

name: Ant Keeping Simulator
description: Grow, feed and care for your colony of mighty ants in a realistic semi-idle simulation of ant keeping. Created in collaboration with ant keeping enthusiasts, Ant Keeping Simulator will be an accurate experience to ant keepers.

name: Another Hour Another Planet
description: Explore another world in the community-built spiritual successor to One Hour One Life.

name: Anomalytics: From the Files of the Arcane Statistics Authority
description: As an agent of the Arcane Statistics Authority, delve into the concrete depths of abandoned warehouses, malicious start-ups, and redacted art exhibitions to log arcane phenomena. Armed with your trusty calculator and a trove of empirical equipment, prepare to combat the unknown ... by measuring it.

name: Aquis
description: Aquis: A strategic elemental adventure where a human mage, stranded in a mystical world, must collaborate with elemental beings to mend a portal breach. Battle shadow creatures, restore harmony, and seek a path back to Earth.

name: Arcadia Fallen II
description: In this sequel to the award-winning roleplay visual novel, Arcadia Fallen, you play as a senior student at Seven Wind’s Academy. Choose from three different magical disciplines, and let your choices shape the personality of your character as they navigate school life during a time of great change.

name: Black Blade
description: This is a very classic puzzle game

name: Blacklist Mafia
description: Blacklist Mafia - is not only a struggle for power and money, but also a dangerous game of survival. Who will be blacklisted, and who will become the new boss? Find out with us!

name: Black Werewolf
description: Black Werewolf: Werewolves from neighboring lands invaded your lands and began to destroy all your property. The village elder had no choice but to send you to deal with the enemies and find out what was going on.

name: Blazing Trail
description: Escape failed! All we have left is our will to survive, the endless hordes of enemies, and enough bullets to rip them all to shreds. Blazing trail. Vertical co-op shooter, offering accessible, action-packed gameplay.

name: Blender Start Here
description: Want to learn Blender but don't know where to start? START HERE!

name: BlockBawks
description: Learn Python, a real world programming language, by controlling your character with code and solving 100+ challenges in story mode - or test your skills in PvP against friends. If you're stuck, ask someone to join your game and help out.

name: Block;Shift
description: 3D platformer puzzle game with light horror elements, lonely and surreal atmosphere

name: Blood And Fear: Part 1
description: Experience a thrilling third-person shooter game with action, adventure, and romance. Fight zombies and soldiers, complete missions, and unlock new areas. Meet characters who will help you on your journey and have fun with both story and arena modes.

name: Blood On The Thames
description: A murder mystery puzzle game with visual novel elements in a Gothic, Lovecraftian world. Collect clues, solve puzzles, interrogate suspects, and uncover the mystery surrounding the death of Mini’s husband.

name: Blood Peace
description: Blood Peace, a hyper-violent FPS, immerses players in intense cybernetic warfare. Unravel a cryptic story or dive into chaotic action. Hunt Easter eggs, survive diverse environments, and master unique skills. Join the ultimate killing machine in this fast-paced adventure!

name: Bond Blues
description: It's 2026, and you're a bail bondsman in Burlington. A fully voiced visual novel exploring the obligations of duty, and what justice really means.

name: Bone and Arrow
description: Let your arrows fly (towards friends or enemies)! Hone your skills and join your allies to demonstrate your archery prowess. Work together or against each other to survive in this fantastical world of bones and arrows.

name: Boss Simulator
description: Boss Simulator is a business simulation game with role-playing elements. As a boss, in order to take your secretary to the island and enjoy life as soon as possible, you have to PUA your employees and shape them into overtime machines, making money for you day and night!

name: Bot Hunt
description: Bot Hunt is a 2D proximity hide-and-seek strategy game. Use an array of weapons and gadgets to outsmart your opponents!

name: BotMobile
description: How much are you afraid of heights?

name: Boxing Go
description: Welcome to Boxing GO: Where Champions Rise! Get ready to play the electrifying clash of boxing in the ring as Boxing GO brings you the most thrilling boxing matches.

name: Bunker's Shadow
description: The game is a First Person Shooter.In a huge dangerous underground, you need to save a little girl.Being lost in a huge bunker, the task is to survive and find the keys for the doors and find the way to the exit. An encounter with zombies and enemy soldiers is inevitable.

name: Butterfly Simulator
description: Embark on a serene journey with "Butterfly Simulator"! Glide through a dynamic world, unlock stunning skins, and immerse in the beauty of nature. Relax, explore, and transform in this peaceful escape. Welcome to your whimsical retreat in the heart of nature's wonder.

name: Street Fighting Simulator
description: Some strange guys from the next street came to your neighborhood, kick them out.

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991: Play for USA
description: DLS makes it possible to play for USA

name: Solar System Simulator
description: Gravity and exploration sandbox

name: Streamer Life Simulator 2
description: In the second game of the series, competition has increased and now everyone wants to be a streamer. Are you ready to stream until your cpu burns out?

name: NightClub Simulator
description: seduce girl or get into fight, you can do anythings in virtual night club that you can't do in real life.

name: Road Dinner Simulator
description: Road Dinner SImulator is an exciting cafe management simulation game where you'll become the owner and head chef of a small but cozy cafe on the edge of a picturesque highway. This game allows you to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of culinary adventures and business.

name: Rent A Car Simulator 24
description: Rent A Car Simulator. Start by renting your first car. Expand your rental car fleet by purchasing different vehicles and grow your car rental business. Drive your cars and get them fixed when they break down. Find new customers. Build and improve your rent a car office.

name: Relocation Simulator
description: Unpack a World of Relaxation with Relocation Simulator! Ease your stress by helping others move. Dive into the satisfying process of carefully packing, transporting, and unpacking items, all with the simple pleasure of setting up a new home.

name: Fight School Simulator
description: Step into the world of Martial Arts, an immersive FPS Simulation where you take on the role of a martial arts instructor determined to build the ultimate dojo. From humble beginnings, guide to greatness by mastering martial arts, teaching the next generation of fighters, and standing up to rivals.

name: Insect Flight Simulator VR
description: This is a casual VR game that simulates insect flights, which immersed players in the beautiful world of insects. In the game, players can control the flying trajectory of the butterfly through the handle and feel the thrill of insects soaring the sky.

name: Hairdresser Simulator: Beards and Mustaches
description: Master the perfect shave with the Beards and Mustaches DLC! Shave, clip, and style beards to meet your clients' needs. Transform your salon into the establishment of choice for discerning gentlemen. Elevate their style and make each customer feel like a king.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Takasaki Line (Ueno to Takasaki) E233-3000 series
description: The Takasaki Line is a 74.7 km long line connecting Omiya Station in Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture to Takasaki Station in Takasaki City, Gunma Prefecture. This DLC includes the Tohoku Main Line section between Ueno and Omiya stations, for a total length of 101.4 km.

name: Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2
description: Experience the adrenaline rush of emergency response in Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator 2.

name: Ambulance Simulator 911 Emergency
description: Ambulance Simulator is an exhilarating simulation that allows you to become a real-life rescuer and a member of the emergency medical service team. In this game, you'll experience the responsibility and adrenaline associated with working on the frontlines of emergency medical assistance.

name: Candy Shop Simulator
description: Dive into a sugary world of sweetness in Candy Shop Simulator! Open your shop, create delectable pastries, manage sales, and expand your candy empire. Satisfy your sweet tooth and build your confectionery legacy now!

name: Carlson's Ticker Simulator
description: With love from Mother Russia!

name: Chocolate Factory Simulator
description: Enter the world of steam and sugar and become a master chocolatier in Chocolate Factory Simulator. Craft gourmet chocolate for your customers in your steampunk workshop with the help of your automaton assistant Nougat.

name: Construction Simulator: Year 2 Season Pass
description: Add the Year 2 Season Pass to your game and enjoy even more content!

name: CozyCat Simulator
description: Experience a cozy and atmospheric feline adventure in "CozyCat Simulator." Defend your territory or form alliances in this cinematic Victorian world. Engage in dynamic mechanics, from hunting mice to mischievous antics.

name: Forklift Simulator
description: Start your career in logistics today in Forklift Simulator! Take on a variety of different missions, a selection of vehicles and an extensive career mode in which you can put your skills to the test. Are you ready for the challenges ahead?

name: Battle RC
description: Immerse yourself in this new robot combat game where you'll fight against others and build your own bots to find out who's best. Are you prepared to dominate the arena and claim victory in Battle RC?

name: Meteorite Z: The Apocalypse
description: Hardcore top-down zombie shooter, one bite and you are a zombie, you will have allies, manage your team effectively. Use many types of weapons to suppress hordes of zombies. A colorful system for dismembering opponents.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Season Pass Vol. 2
description: 2 environments where you can create your own tracks, 2 areas to add to the Hot Wheels Creature Rampage mode and 24 vehicles to win in great style: all of this is waiting for you in the Season Pass Vol. 2!

name: Daienkai Buchou
description:
Become a master of the banquet! "Enkai Buchou" and "Enkai Buchou 2" are now even more powerful!!

"Daienkai Buchou" is a collection of mini-games based on the motif of Japanese salaryman culture "Banquet".

Let's play unique and diverse mini-games to liven up banquets such as year-end parties, New Year's parties, cherry blossom viewing, and barbecues, and improve the skills of the manager!

We are accepting reservations for banquets now~!!

What is the skill of your banquet organizer? The organizers of the banquet are very busy, such as the partition of the place and the care for the boss. As the manager of the banquet, the player will challenge mini-games with various scenes of in-house events as a motif.

A number of mini-games for all seasons! There are a total of 9 mini-games such as "a drink master" who pours beer into a mug and "dish turning" to help with entertainment. Some of them are full of seasonal feelings such as cherry blossom viewing, Nagashi somen noodles, and fireworks display, and they change every season.
In each mini-game, if you get a certain score or higher, a "hard" mode will appear. Let's aim to update the high score with a "hard" with a high difficulty level.

Exciting bingo tournament!!
If you get a high score and get a bingo ticket, let's participate in "Bingo" in the menu! Depending on the degree of collection of bingo prizes and the score of the game, the title as a banquet manager will rise, so please aim for the ultimate title!

name: Planetary Parfait
description: Planetary Parfait is designed to support a wide range of scientific research tasks, including geologic mapping, feature analysis, and mission planning. Includes features to support these tasks, such as 3D visualization, annotation tools, and data layers that can be overlaid onto the terrain data.

name: Macau Midnight Madness
description: “Macau Midnight Madness” is a Romantic Comedy Yuri Visual Novel and Dating Sim. Play as Mikayla as she goes to Macau to take part in a tennis exhibition game and ends up finding the woman of her dreams along the way.

name: Let's Roll
description: Avoid various obstacles and reach goal. It is a third-person platformer action genre. Buying skills with coins will help you reach your goal

name: Zeitz Machz: Rhapsody
description: A strange location, an awkward situation, and a mysterious girl: what will these lead to?

name: Ghost Hospital: In Thousand Horror Hill
description: It is a exploration adventure in which the main character roams a magical hospital in search of a friend who has disappeared into another world. The genre is based on a comical atmosphere, with a bit of horror waiting for you deep into the story.

name: Critical Fishing
description: Take part in wormkinds heroic struggle for freedom from their archnemesis. Upgrade your arsenal, tools and submarine to decimate the fish population to reach the ultimate goal: to boldly go where no worm has gone before.

name: Shadows Unveiled: Agnes
description: "Shadows Unveiled: Agnes" is an immersive horror game where you explore an ancient abandoned apartment, uncovering dark secrets and facing unimaginable horrors as you seek the truth behind the disturbing events.

name: Enkai Buchou
description:
I will improve the skills of 4 banquet arts that are indispensable for banquets, such as "drinking master" and "catch dance", and aim to be the manager of tomorrow's banquet.

If you clear the beginner mode, you can play the professional mode. Earn bingo tickets according to the score in each game. Items collected by bingo can be collected in the waiting room.

Drinking Master:
I will pour beer well into the flowing empty mug. Don't forget to replenish the pitcher's beer!

Catch Dance:
Catch the flying fruit with a sword and compete for the score. Let's exchange the full sword in a timely manner.

Champagne Tower:
We will pile up champagne glasses aiming for the stars in the night sky. Beware of disturbing slippers!!

Duet Star:
The sense of rhythm is life in songs! Press the button at the right time according to the notes and aim for a high score!

Bingo the Great:
I got a bingo ticket based on the result of the mini-game. With the collected tickets, you can challenge the bingo game.

You can get the number of bingo items you won. Your title will be determined by the number of prizes!

name: Hiiro no Kakera Tamayori-hime Kitan: Omoi Iro no Kioku for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of the PS vita version, with additional content from the PS3 version.

Hiiro no Kakera Tamayori-hime Kitan: Omoi Iro no Kioku is a bundle of Hiiro no Kakera and it's fandisc, Hiiro no Kakera: Ano Sora no Shita de.

name: Miimi to Taata no Waiwai Oekaki Doubutsuen
description: A Sega Pico game.

name: Pyro Jump Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Mahjong Adventure Umi he: Summer Waltz
description: Real Mahjong Adventure: Umi he Summer Waltz is a video game published in 1998 on SEGA Saturn by SETA Corporation. It's an adventure game, set in an anime / manga and visual novel themes.

name: Survivor Master-Sifu

name: Moonwakers: Episode 01

Dive into a survival roguelite by taking control of a S.E.E.D, an advanced reconnaissance android! To accomplish your mission, explore exoplanets to determine if they are suitable for humanity.

Thus, you'll need to search for vital elements necessary for life: Carbon, Hydrogen, Nitrogen, Oxygen, Phosphorus, and Sulfur. But beware, danger lurks on this unknown land, and your survival will depend on your ingenuity and skills. Traps abound, and you'll need to strategize to make it through.

Regularly, you'll have to shelter your character to escape ionic storms. Exploration will allow you to acquire new skills and enjoy more autonomy, speed, and gliding. Your biggest challenge? Managing your energy to avoid extinction.

It has evolved significantly from the previous work "Enkai Buchou" where the elements of the mini-game collection were strong, and it is now possible to enjoy the game in an adventure way due to the structure according to the story and events.

It's even more powerful than the previous work. Try "Enkai Buchlu 2"! Overcome the demon president's order with banquet performance.

This is the flower path of success! I'm going to drink as ordered.

Get the heart of your employees!!

The managing director is being targeted by mosquitoes!
Protect your tasty skin!

description:
Hello, everyone. My name is Ikurumi, a game scenario writer.

This time, with the cooperation of Genki Co., Ltd., I'm going to introduce you to my friend in the form of a mobile phone app.
The success of the detective "Ryosuke Kibukawa".

It's a game, so there are some dramatizes and productions,
I hope you will understand and enjoy it. In addition, the names of the people who appear, place names, company names, etc. are fictitious.

The story begins when you are asked to investigate the strange death of a game programmer.
"Takrimakus" is a network RPG that is said to "die when you play it". What is the secret hidden in this game!?

name: 7 Invaders
description: Seven friendly aliens land in a country town to go to a rock concert... But some people believe they've arrived to take over the planet! Anything can happen in this fun interplanetary story, narrated by Gustavinho, star of O Enigma da Esfinge. Have an instant seventh-grade contact with the 7 Invaders, an adventure full of galactically animated screens and otherworldly activities.

name: Flicts
description: Flicts is an interactive CD-ROM based on Ziraldo's 1969 book of the same name. It tells a story about a color that couldn't fit in with the rainbow, the flags, or anywhere else, and no one initially recognizes its deserved value.

name: Isolation
description:
Zuriumak, a small town in the Irrizzary District (Capital Zone), is right in the radius of the district's large laboratory, called Zaryeth. On any given day, an unfortunate mistake happens, causing an unidentified pathogen to spread in a considerable radius, but not so alarming as to put the whole district in isolation.

Zuriumak is within that radius, so the authorities decide only to make a quarantine of 15 days, praying that people don't leave their homes. Unexpectedly, the opposite happened, and the quarantine, which was estimated to last only two weeks, was extended indefinitely.

It has now been almost 2 years since the alert was sent out. And it is not known how many people from Zuriumak have survived... One family, still trying to survive as best they can, is slowly beginning to decay into despair without realizing it. Karey, the eldest son, is still in his right mind, though he assumes not so much. He wants to do something to save his mother and sister from the horrible situation they find themselves in.

Karey doesn't know how to deal with the situation... The only people he could feel safe with have decided to break the quarantine, but since then nothing has been heard from them until today... Karey finds something on his computer, something he thought wasn't real... An old message from his best friend, Haruzi.

What will Karey do next? Will he try to leave? But he can't unless he gets the keys to the cellar door, which his mother is so careful to hide. You have two ways, Karey... None of them are good. What do you plan to do?

name: The Secret of Crystal Mountain
description: Adventure through a land full of mystery and wonder in The Secret of Crystal Mountain, a platforming adventure game about a delivery fox making his way through a magical world. Stranded on a mysterious island, you explore, get to know its residents and uncover its magical secrets. Run around, swim, climb, glide and use the unique abilities of your little bird friend to explore the island and reach the mountain's peak.

name: Bombo
description: Bombo is a fast-paced arcade-style platformer where players control a character jumping across the screen to collect tokens while avoiding enemies. The game's core gameplay revolves around quick reflexes and strategic movement as players aim to gather all tokens, with added bonuses for collecting them in the correct flashing order. Power-ups occasionally fall from above, temporarily granting the ability to capture enemies for points. With only three lives at their disposal, players must balance speed and caution to progress. Bombo's simple yet challenging mechanics, combined with its time-limited power-ups and bonus scoring system, create an addictive and engaging experience reminiscent of classic arcade games.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Vol. 2 - Kairoukan Satsujin Jiken
description:
Hello, I saw you again. I'm Ikurumi, a game scenario writer.

Do you know the previous work "Masque of Fantasy Murder Case"? Half a year since that incident. This time, it's called "Kairokan" It happened in a strange building built in the middle of the sea. Let me introduce the case.

The mansion built by the former chairman of a famous construction company. The story begins when you are invited to the inauguration event. 7 invited guests who visited. The master doesn't show up.
And a strange building that encompasses everything. What kind of events will be held?

And the incident happens.

A serial murder that occurs in a closed building under the sea.
Who on earth is the culprit...!?
And what is the trick hidden in this building!?

Argus: Urban Legend is an interactive horror thriller mystery game, it is YOUR story. Your decisions do not only affect the course of the game but also the ending of this thriller.

Communicate with different characters via a messenger. Unravel the dark secrets surrounding ARGUS and other urban legends.
It's up to you to collect clues, solve puzzles, and stop the horror.
But watch out because you can't trust everyone…

name: Mercuralia

name: Clover Toshokan no Juunin-tachi
description:
On the corner of a modern town, on higher ground atop a hill is a Western building, old as though it were left behind by time. Closed for many years, it is a private library called "Clover Library". Loving books from a young age, Aikawa Chihiro wishes to one day have a job involving books. She then earns the job of a live-in custodian of the Clover Library.

With a look like that of on old photograph, strange and impossible things occur there, one after another.

The sense of being gazed upon, even though nobody should be inside. Books that moved before one knew it. Large, large shadows peering through the window. Finally, at night, people that come out of nowhere who call themselves "frequenters since the olden days".

Surrounded by these individuals- all of whom possess distinct personalities- Chihiro prepares the library for its opening day. Eventually, she's no longer able to suppress her suspicions and confusion over the continuous occurrences of strange happenings, as well as the truth behind who or what these frequenters really are.

Struck by her questions, this is their reply:

"I'm sorry. We kept our mouths shut about it. We are not human."
"In truth, we are actually books."

name: Clover Toshokan no Juunin-tachi II
description:
On the corner of a modern town, there is a private library called the "Clover Library". During the day, it seems like an ordinary library. However, when night comes, it becomes a strange library where the books take on human forms.

The cookbook, Natsume. The picture book, Riku. The book of paintings, Shikimi. The technical book, Itsuki. The book that's the latest craze, Aoi. Aikawa Chihiro, the protagonist, became the library's live-in caretaker. While somewhat inept, she continued to manage the library.

One day... The library's pet cat, Kuu, brought a single key to Chihiro.

"I wonder where this key is for? When it's night, I'll try asking everyone."

Now, on the very top floor of Clover Library, the so-called "forbidden door" will be opened.

description:
City Connection Rocket" is the latest work in the "City Connection" series, one of Jareco's most popular franchises. The player controls the "Clarisker" on which the main character Clarice is on board to fight against the evil secret society. The new system "Super Rocket" destroys enemy characters and roads with "body hits" and advances the game while attacking with oil cans with homing function.

If you take the red item "super confidential document" that is falling on each stage, there will be more information that can be viewed on the option screen. The information added is packed with must-see contents for challenging players, such as the back setting of the game, story branching, and how to put out hidden characters.

Hidden characters have various effects, such as increasing the score and clearing the stage. The characters are "Genesis-3 (Field Combat)" and "Burning Pro Player (Burning!! There are many characters suitable for "hidden" that Jareko fans will grin involuntarily, such as "Professional baseball," "Tenseiryu (Saint Dragon)" and "Buta-san Referee". If you are interested, don't miss the red item "Super Secret Documents" and get it.

A mobile 1v1 fighting game that combines the allure of Philippine mythology with deep and engaging gameplay mechanics. SINAG ensures that even newcomers can quickly grasp the basics of combat and start unleashing powerful attacks. However, as you step into the arena, you'll discover a game that is both easy to start and play, yet challenging to master.

SINAG goes beyond delivering thrilling gameplay—it also offers a journey of cultural immersion. Immerse yourself in the vibrant visuals and meticulously crafted backgrounds that pay homage to the beauty and diversity of the Philippines. Experience the essence of

description: An atmospheric horror game and story-driven experience, inspired by Filipino mythology.

name: Hablon Dawani
description: Before the supreme god, Gugurang turned Dawani into a goddess of rainbow, Dawani lived a simple life in the village of Iraya. Together with Huraw, her loving mother, Dawani would weave colorful and beautiful cloths which they barter with the people in their village. Dawani’s father died a week after her mother heard a raspy chirp from a cricket called “Korokoy” which in superstition, they believe brings death to a love one to anyone who hears it. Dawani heard the “Korokoy” just before a storm started. The storm ravaged their village for days. Determined to put an end to the devastating storm, Dawani decided to investigate by asking villagers about what they suspect is happening, that is where her adventure begins.
