name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2024-2025
description:
The "Professional Baseball Spirits" series is a professional baseball game that pursues realism.

The first home game, "Professional Baseball Spirits 2004,'' was released on March 25, 2004. "Professional Baseball Spirits 2015" introduces 3D scanning technology that photographs professional baseball players from 360 degrees and reproduces them three-dimensionally.

Furthermore, we have also adopted laser scanning technology that measures the precise shape of the stadium, allowing you to enjoy a realistic baseball experience with overwhelming expressiveness.

name: Ruthnar Online
description: Ruthnar Online is a free sandbox 2D MMORPG where you can face powerful creatures to develop your character in an open medieval fantasy world and craft your own equipment with eight diferent professions. The game also features guild wars and four different factions, join one of them to defend it and raid enemy cities. Finally, when you get strong enough you'll be able to fight in the BattleGrounds: Stronghold Conquests, Combat Arenas, Survival/Battle Royale, Leagues, Tournaments and more.

name: Yoiyo Mori no Hime
description: When her village was burned by the militarized country of Stahl, Ilza escaped into a dark forest and ends up lost. People believe that the forest, "Yoiyo Mori", is cursed, and those who take a step inside will never come out again. As she wanders inside the forest, Ilza loses consciousness and is taken into a certain mansion—where she finds seven men who bear resentment towards Stahl. They are waiting for a chance to take revenge on the country, and her life with them has just begun…

name: Toilet Truble
description: Sin descripción

name: Pango
description: Pango is an action game released in 1983 for IBM PC/compatible computers. It is a clone of the arcade game Pengo and the gameplay is very similar. In the game, players controls Pango, a penguin like character, with the goal of clearing an ice maze of all the bees roaming around it within the one minute time limit. The maze consists of numerous ice blocks which Pango can either push around or destroy. The bees are constantly chasing the player throughout the maze and will cause Pango to lose a life if caught. The bees can be eliminated in two ways: they can either be squashed with ice blocks, or if they are near a wall that Pango is kicking the bee will become dazed allowing Pango a short time to squash it.

name: Deep Dark Wrath
description:
Deep Dark Wrath is a hand-drawn, card collecting, dungeon crawler where you fend off countless enemies and find its source with the help of powerful Enchanted Cards.

It's a 2D Topdown Action RPG Collectathon game that focuses on being easy-to-learn, replayable with the variety of ways to dungeon dive, but somewhat hard-to-master with a mostly fixed layout Dungeon.

name: CavEX
description: CavEX, short for Cave Explorer, is a Wii homebrew game with the goal to recreate most of the core survival aspects up until Beta 1.7.3. Any features beyond will not be added. The game has been dubbed by players and fans online as "Minecraft: Wii Edition".

name: The Failure of Aniconfuku: Convention Murder Episode
description:
Unlike many internet-founded projects, this convention was successful. But close to the end of the second day, someone was found dead in convention hall C. People reported to the local police, and all suspects were gathered in the police station.

And now, Here you are.

name: Eunae Liaro in: Fowl Play
description: You are a scholar, bard, and lover of a good mystery. What you are not is a detective. But when your detective friend is murdered while working on a case of his own, it's up to you to pick up where he left off.

name: Hauntsville
description: You're a nameless traveler, stranded in a ghost town in the Cursed West. Use your wits, elbow grease, and the iron on your hip. Build a homestead, work the land, and survive against unspeakable monsters in this unique Western horror survival game - alone or with friends!

name: Classified: of 2015
description:
In [CLASSIFIED] of 2015, play as a yearbook editor working at a photography studio, trying to make sense of a bizarre photoshoot at Voyager Academy.

Use context clues and sleuth through the available photos to determine who's who, and solve the mystery of what went down at this middle school.

name: Wrongly Accused
description:
Wrongly Accused is a Case of the Golden Idol inspired murder mystery in the vein of Columbo... more of a How-Dunnit than a Whodunnit.

Set during the Years of Lead in 1970s Italy, an attempted assasination attempt on the mayor may not be what everyone thinks. The main suspect Tony has all the evidence pointing at him but maybe it's all a little too convenient.

name: We Suspect Foul Play
description:
Hollywood, a land of dreams!

But this dream has turned into a nightmare, with the assassination of famous actress Mary Helen in her villa in the middle of the night.

You are tasked to search the scene, find clues, and reconstruct what has happened!

name: Bombox
description: Bombox is a fast-paced casual game. Players must find and defuse the correct bomb wires before the countdown on the bomb box ends.

name: Fairy Tales 4 Kids Interactive
description: "Favourite Fairy Tales for Children" offers eight stories straight from the Slavic folklore and a charming "Catch a Star" minigame. These captivating tales accompanied by a game will surely hold your child's attention:

name: Riri: Origin of Surabaya
description: For youngsters who have visited Surabaya, surely they already know about the statue of Crocodile and Sharks which is the symbol of Surabaya. According to the community, sharks and crocodiles used to exist. And they love to fight. Exactly as depicted in the statue. What is their story? And is it true that the name Surabaya is taken from that story? Come download and follow the full story in Riri Surabaya and Its Origins.

name: Machick
description: Defeat the heavily armed army of anti-magic toads and free the forest from destruction. Machick is a casual game where you craft your own wands, vanquish enemies, collect XP, and choose upgrades to go further on the journey.

name: Night Confessional
description:
It was several years before the abolition of the papacy that coin-operated confessionals began to populate the cities.

An interactive fiction piece about a confession booth at the end of the year.

name: Dr. Seuss': The Cat in the Hat
description: A port of Dr. Seuss’: The Cat in the Hat for Game Boy Advance.

name: Ario
description: A fantasy land plagued by nightmares, a common lad trying to rescue his missing mother and an evil forces conspiration to be unveiled. Join Ario in this thrilling adventure where your crossbow and skills will determine the fate of your people.

name: Killbeat
description: Killbeat is a rhythm shooter roguelike focusing on fast and brutal gameplay with a wide build variety. Descend into Cadence Drop, a sinkhole devouring an entire city. Fight your way deeper, driven by the rhythm towards the source of the beat. Make music with guns and guts!

name: Annihilator
description: Sin descripción

name: Helga's Cheese Festival
description: Hey Arnold! fan game.

name: Pagan Gods
description:
Fight against the strongest spirits and gods in the new game from Ino.Worlds! Glory and reward await you!
A game with dark Slavic mythology lore using the beloved 3-in-a-row mechanics (careful, addictive!).

name: Gravitee 2
description: Gravitee is back! Play through 40 levels of Interstellar Golf. Gravitee 2 features 4 different game play types and 90 awards to win.

name: Queen Wanda
description: Queen Wanda is an educational and role-playing game that takes you back to the ancient times of Slavic tribes of Wandals and Lechites living in southern Poland. You will be Wanda's detective, a brave and virtuous lah, who has to uncover the mystery of the Wawel Dragon and its summoners.

name: Kajko i Kokosz 2: Cucuny Lek
description: Kajko i Kokosz 2: Cucuny Lek is another (after School of Flying ) adventure and arcade game, intended for young computer users (from 6 years old), enabling the players to take on the role of two titular heroes known from Janusz Christy's comics. This time, Kajko and Kokosz set off on a journey to find a medicine that will heal Castellan Mirmił, who was insidiously infected with a cold by evil robbers.

name: Polytrack
description: Polytrack is a low poly racing game made by the single developer, Kodub, that is inspired by Trackmania. It has a growing community of players and high skill ceiling. It also allows players to create their own tracks to share and play with the community.

name: Kajko i Kokosz: Szkoła Latania
description: Another adventure and arcade game, after Kajko and Kokosz in the Land of Borostworów, intended for children (from four years old), entirely based on the cult comic book by Janusz Christy, or more precisely - on the volume "Szkoła lania".

name: ShellShock Live
description: It's shell or be shelled on the battlefield as you pummel other players into the earth with a seemingly endless arsenal of weapons launched from your very own mobile tank in this tactical, online multiplayer display of strategy and skill.

name: Kajko i Kokosz: Mirmiłowo Wielkie
description: The plot of the story focuses on the conspiracy of an evil sorcerer who plans to take over the family town of our heroes. As you can easily guess, the two inseparable friends will quickly decipher his intentions and try to thwart the villain's evil plans. In this chapter of the game, we witness the arrival of a mysterious merchant named Hodon to Mirmiłów. By giving the Castellan a vision of building a stone fortress, the villain quickly ingratiates himself with him, leading to a drastic increase in taxes and sidelining Kajko and Kokosz. However, the fearless warriors decide to regain their former influence and help the Castellan, who is unknowingly getting into more and more trouble.

name: Alpamys
description:
The first Kazakh platformer game consisting of three scenes. The hero of the game (Alpamys) fulfills the quests of Baisyn Sultan.
At the end, it is necessary to defeat the Wizard (Final Stage).

name: ZX Terror House
description:
You are alone in the middle of a stormy night, trapped in your broken-down car on a deserted road. The darkness is palpable, and the wind moans like an echoing wail. Desperate to find help, you venture through a shadowy cemetery that stretches in the direction of the only source of light you glimpse: an ancient mansion shrouded in terrifying legends.

As you make your way among the graves, killer bats flutter in the sky, emitting bloodcurdling screeches. The tombstones seem to come to life, lurching and lunging toward you, as if they have a will of their own to stop you at all costs. Every step you take is filled with danger and suspense, as you struggle through this cursed graveyard and reach the mansion of terror in search of salvation.

Finally, you make it through the cemetery riddled with killer bats and deadly tombstones, arriving at the entrance to the mansion of terror. However, what you find inside is even more terrifying than you had imagined. As you enter the shadows of the mansion, you come face to face with three legendary figures of terror: Dracula, the Count of Vampires, the Werewolf and the Mummy.

Dracula, with his piercing gaze and sharp fangs, stares at you with vampiric hunger. The Werewolf, with deadly claws and glowing eyes, lies in wait, ready for the hunt. The Mummy, swathed in bandages and slow but relentless, advances toward you with sinister purpose.

You are in the midst of an encounter with horror itself. Your heart is pounding as you face these classic horror monsters while finding a way to survive and escape from the mansion of terror, unraveling the mysteries that envelop it.

From out of the shadows emerges an even more terrifying figure: The Grim Reaper, holding a deadly scythe. With each swing of the scythe, you feel the cold wind of death brush against your skin. You must be quick and cunning to dodge his attacks.

You use your dodging skills and manage to avoid Death's scythe in a deadly dance. Finally, you find the opportunity to counterattack, and bravely take on Frankenstein. After a fierce fight, you manage to defeat him and the giant falls to the ground, inert.

Finally, you discover an ancient coffin that contains the secrets of the heart of the beast and the way to escape from this world of nightmares.

You have managed to overcome all the horrors, defeat the monsters and find the solution to escape from the mansion of terror. Finally, you can breathe a sigh of relief, knowing that you have prevailed in this suspenseful and dangerous game. Congratulations on your bravery and determination! Or maybe NOT?

name: Zeddytron 2081
description:
It's the year 2081 and servant robots have become commonplace, though too expensive for most people. In that same year, a large abandoned Sinclair warehouse is discovered with thousands of mint, working ZX81s and some genius decides to build a line of cheap and affordable robots using them: The Zeddytrons.

Based on ZX81s and huge rampacks (by 2081, rampack science has advanced significantly) the Zeddytrons become massively popular and the world fills with them ... until the unexpected happens! Wobblying rampacks cause the Zeddytrons to malfunction and declare mankind an obsolete species!

Your mission is to move through 50 waves, blasting Zeddytrons, avoiding undestructible Zeddyhulks and rescuing human survivors!

You can control your player using AWSD to move and JIKL to shoot simultaneously in 8 directions. Otherwise, you can use OPQAM / Cursor / ZXPand+ Joystick to move and shoot by pressing fire and the direction in which you want to shoot.

Good Luck!

name: Moskao Fighter
description: Help our hero protect his colony by repelling the attack of voracious killer spiders in this exciting ZX81 game.

name: Poe
description: In this fast-paced difficult platformer, you assume the role of Bernard and his son Poe in an attempt to find each other. Enjoy the short, but sweet story of their paths to each other that are filled with friends, enemies and other obstacles.

name: Offroad Jeep Quest: Mountain Trails
description: The wild awaits—are you ready to conquer it?

name: Anime: Japanese Goblins
description: Sin descripción

name: Learn to Play Vol. 1: Fruit Collect
description: Sin descripción

name: NightGhast
description: NightGhast is a first-person horror game about wicked witches and sinister widows...

name: Cleaning Queens 2: Sparkling Palace
description: Wipe, scrub, brush… And enjoy sparkling clean rooms as a true Cleaning Royal!

name: Fruity Puzzler
description: Welcome to the juicy world of Fruity Puzzler, where vibrant colors and brain-teasing challenges collide! Dive into a refreshing gaming experience that will tantalize your senses and stimulate your mind.

name: Restaurant Health Inspection Simulator: Sanitary Service
description: Explore, Inspect, Report: Master the Skills of a Restaurant Health Inspector.

name: Brain Memory 2
description: Enhance your memory every day and become a master!

name: Go Kart Mania
description: Your Ticket to World Kart Racing!

name: Drift Legacy
description: Epic Drifts, Legendary Roads: Your Journey Begins Now!

name: Sport Clubs Collection
description: Introducing the Sport Clubs Collection: Immerse yourself in the thrill of precision and skill with our exclusive 3-in-1 Games Bundle, featuring Archery Club, Darts Club, and Baseball Club – the perfect fusion of classic sports in one exhilarating pa

name: Tropico
description:
Tropico is rich in resources, ripe with potential, and crying out for a leader with extraordinary vision! As El Presidente, transform this untapped pocket of paradise into an industrial powerhouse, a tourist playground and a budding superpower — all under your firm, but fair hand.

Take hold of the levers of power with the Meta Quest’s motion controllers, and lead your people by the hand to a brighter future using custom-built VR interfaces and intuitive gestures.

name: Toy Monsters
description:
Toy Monsters is a mixed-reality tabletop tower defense game inspired by other classic titles in the genre. Built from the ground up with hand tracking and mixed reality passthrough in mind.

Defend yourself against the hordes across 3 worlds, 33+ levels and bonus levels, bosses, and an endless mode.

As you progress through the levels, you'll unlock new toys with unique special powers. You can enhance your toys with magical potions and use crystal power to unleash magic beams from your hands, transform your fingers into flamethrowers, and more.

Defend against hordes of invading monsters by strategically placing magical toy defenders powered by star power. You will encounter a range of enemies, each with their unique abilities and weaknesses.

name: Strike Rush
description:
Embark on the Ultimate Battle Sports Event of the 22nd Century!

This team-based XR FPS game thrives on communication with your AI companion, Blitzmon.

Traverse from Seoul-inspired landscapes to technologically advanced stadiums, immersing yourself in a unique and intense 4v4 battleﬁeld.

Gear up for the thrill, pilot the colossal Colossus machine, and lead your team to victory with unmatched ﬁrepower!

name: Starship Home
description: Traverse the galaxy in a starship bound for discovery! Prepare your living room for lift off as you depart on a cozy interplanetary expedition to collect, nurture, and befriend plants from around the galaxy. Immerse yourself in the mystery of an interstellar crisis from the comfort of your own home.

name: MLB Home Run Derby VR
description: We’re thrilled to announce that Home Run Derby VR has received the call to the big leagues! HRDVR is headed for the Meta Quest Store in 2024- and we’re changing the game with a massive set of exciting new features!

name: Unearthed VR
description:
Battle with bears and protect your cubs, become a prowling jaguar, shrink in size to protect your fishy family from marauding piranhas, and even ride beetles into gigantic Amazonian flowers! Unearthed is a funny, impactful and inspirational adventure into the wild like never before, using incredible animal superpowers to find the missing Professor and save the world!

Harness your predator powers, your bow and arrows, and bio scanner in an attempt to complete your vital missions.

Don’t worry, you won’t be alone in this mission. On the journey are your haphazard robot guides, voiced by Richard Ayoade (Soul, The Mandalorian) and Sian Clifford (Fleabag) and the Professor, played by Indira Varma (Game Of Thrones, Obi Wan) as you travel through epic Amazon and Alaskan forests.

These robots will help you collect the animal and plant information you need to find the Professor. They believe she holds the key to protecting these ecosystems and saving the world... the rest is up to you.

name: Some Assembly Required
description: Build robots, help humans, cause chaos! Some Assembly Required is a sandbox game about designing and building robots to serve the needs of squishy, hapless humans in the world of tomorrow.

name: Forgotten Magic Tower
description: A dark maze style map exploration meat pigeon game, defeating enemies in a foggy dungeon to search for treasures, finding the entrance to the next level, and gradually collecting equipment to strengthen and defeat bosses and difficult official cards

name: Tatari: Curse Road
description: In this quiet town in the countryside recently a rumor has been spreading. It is said that if you walk alone at night a female ghost calls out to you. "Are you a…***?"

name: Shatter and Spin
description: Play electronic gyro, memories of cyber childhood! In Shatter and Spiral, players will be able to modify their gyro partners and manipulate them to shatter enemies one by one!

name: Nornium
description: This is a machine girl themed air combat action role-playing game. In the world of Nornium, you can experience ARPG cosmic air combat and its Rougelike variants, manipulate the "Time Tree" to jump around in parallel time and space at will, or enjoy a leisurely slow life in the presidential suite.

name: The Adventure Story of Yixiu
description: Fantasy RPG that features AP turn-based combat and various RPG nurturing elements, while also offering rich and diverse character storylines that grip the heart.

name: Zurarararush!!!
description: Zurararush!!! is a twin-stick shooter that you can play easily! Wear a wig as a weapon and defeat the virus that mutated inside your body! Power up your character and wig and become stronger! Defeat a lot of enemies and feel good! It's an arcade-style casual game that you'll want to play every day.

name: Tribute
description: In "Tribute," a fast-paced roguelike, escape prison and save your son by harvesting souls for power, unlocking abilities, and facing numerous foes. Discover 15 endings shaped by your choices, with extensive upgrades and classes enhancing your journey.

name: Blood Running: Prologue
description: Blood Running: Prologue is a stylish extraction shooter where you'll enter the cyber-wasteland, fight off creatures and bandits, loot valuable gear, and venture into the remnants of a world in ruins. Are you willing to bleed to survive, Blood Runner?

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: The Smurfs DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: The Smurfs

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: US Movies 70s DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Movies 70s

name: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Hunter Pack
description: The Wizard With a Gun Bounty Hunter Pack includes the recipes for Musketeer, Barbarian, and Potionmaker's outfits.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Eamnos VTG Wagon Pack
description: Bring more variety to your railroads and scenarios in Train Simulator with the Eamnos VTG Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Tamns VTG Wagon Pack
description: Expand your railways with additional freight rolling stock, the Tamns VTG Wagon Pack arrives from virtualRailroads.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Zacens Wagon Pack
description: Add freight industry to your collection with the Zacens Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Zcs VTG Wagon Pack
description: Add some new freight rolling stock to your routes and scenarios with the Zcs VTG Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Trailmakers: Rescue Pack
description: You’ve built cars, airplanes, spaceships, boats, and everything in between. Now get ready to be a hero with the new Trailmakers Rescue Pack. Dress the part of one of modern society’s everyday heroes.

name: Tekken 8: Ultimate Pack
description: The Ultimate Pack includes the following content: Avatar Costume: Classic TEKKEN T-Shirt Set (32 designs) and Avatar Skins (Kazuya Mishima, Jin Kazama, and Jun Kazama).
